results: Lend a hand on a laborious task.
Repair a tool or farming implements.
Help secure an audience with the lord/lady.
Listen to a tale of woe.

header.descriptor: The peasant's primary crops and market fare include

results: Grains (2): 1. barley; 2. oats; 3. corn; 4. rice; 5. rye; 6. wheat.
Meats (3): 1. beef; 2. chicken; 3. duck; 4. goat; 5. goose; 6. pigeon; 7. pork; 8. mutton.
Fruits (6): 1. apples; 2. blackberries; 3. blueberries; 4. cherries; 5. lemons; 6. pears; 7. plums; 8. raspberries.
Vegetables (4): 1. beans; 2. beets; 3. broccoli; 4. cabbages; 5. carrots; 6. cauliflower; 7. mushrooms; 8. peas; 9. radishes; 10. squash.
Dairy or eggs (7): 1. cow's milk; 2. goat's milk; 3. sheep's milk; 4. hard cheese; 5. mild cheese; 6. pungent cheese; 7. sharp cheese; 8. soft cheese; 9. eggs; 10. goose eggs.
Herbs and spices (10): 1. basil; 2. garlic; 3. ginger; 4. mint; 5. oregano; 6. parsley; 7. pepper; 8. rosemary; 9. sage; 10. thyme.
